article.title: Raytheon Awarded Electronic Protection Improvement Contract
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Raytheon Company, Missile Systems, Tucson, Arizona, is being awarded a $34,064,647 cost-plus-fixed-fee with performance incentives contract to procure electronic protection improvement program.Â The location of the performance is Tucson, Arizona. Air Armament Center, Eglin Air Force Base, Florida, is the contracting activity.
